toxin.

science.

developing solutions.

collaboration to incorporate a wide range of perspectives and skills.

Evaluate the reliability and credibility of sources when gathering
information.

improve solutions, and inspire new ideas.

impacts of the possible solutions.

113C8C3074E44B39AAB6D968E513BD0F.description:
Synthesize information from multiple credible sources, such as literature,
databases, policy documents, and diverse perspectives from multiple
disciplines, to explore causes and solutions to problems.

9101BF649AA14DA9A2C6E474C3362DF2.description: Devise and execute a plan to solve a problem.

quality, and promotes learning

E6EF2C9107BA4D5192412B91FD8BE11E.description: Describe the importance of privacy for all individuals.

perseverance,honesty, integrity, and accountability, which should be
exhibited by biomedical professionals.

Apply professional standards, as they apply to the habits and characteristics of a
biomedical science professional.

appropriate to the situation.

presentations.

modifications to be made as necessary and serves as a means to monitor
progress toward completion of the project.

completion of a project.

3E12C2F5F1EC4E7581EB51E7A4B7CA34.description:

scheduled.

century.
